title: Proof of concept CloudFormation Editor
author: lotkowskim
content: usage is simple cloudformation template editor, built a proof concept. next steps this project is include static analysis validate template. should autocomplete you type you always bring the docs using ctrl + space { "resources": { "myinstance": { "type": "aws::ec2::instance", "properties": { "instancetype": "t2.micro", "monitoring": true } } }}
